name: Hydro Cannon Strike

effect.description: The user condenses a massive volume of water into a solid pillar and slams it into the target with hydraulic force.

skillVisualPrompt: A thick, high-pressure pillar of cerulean water erupts horizontally on a green screen #00FF00. The water has a dense, viscous liquid texture with sharp white pixel highlights and dark blue outlines. The animation features a 12-frame linear thrust where the water column maintains a solid, metallic-like surface tension while surging forward.
sfxPrompt: A heavy white-noise burst for the initial pressure release followed by a deep, low-frequency sine-wave thud to simulate the physical weight of the water hitting a solid surface.
